content.raw:
After some thought, here's my conclusion:

Writing a test to check if future versions of GLWidget have subscribed to selection messages is tricky. The only way I could think of doing it included some magic with `yield` and check when a thread woke up, and that probably won't work across platforms, if it works at all. Not sure if this is a good idea right now. The transport library doesn't have an interface for processes to introspect topics they are subscribed on--it might be a nice feature to have.

Writing a regression test for #1523 is more doable but it probably requires a major pull request. I've ticketed issue #1622 for this.
